name: Wedge Salad
description: A classic American steakhouse-style wedge salad of crisp iceberg lettuce topped with crunchy bacon, creamy buttermilkâ€“yogurt ranch dressing, tomatoes, and herbs. Easy to prepare and great as a side.

steps.description: Cook the bacon in a pan over medium heat until crisp, turning as needed, about 4 minutes. Break into small pieces and set aside.
Core the iceberg and cut it in half from top to stem. Cut each half into 2 to 3 wedges, keeping the cuts running top to bottom so the leaves nestle together.
Spoon 2 to 3 tablespoons of dressing onto each wedge, distributing evenly. Top each with equal amounts of tomato and bacon, then finish with herbs if using.
